title: Videotape Recording of Composite Sketch Creation

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

Indicating what happened to the videotape recording of the creation of the composite sketch by Karl Nollsch that occurred on 2/3/1978. There is documentation of its existence and has been viewed by detectives after the 2001 DNA connection was made between the East Area Rapist attacks in Northern CA and the Original Night Stalker rape/murders in Southern CA. This is evidence in a double homicide so it existed as late as 2018. I am requesting any documentation of its existence and, if it no longer exists, what happened to it.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Neville

title: DNA Test Results of Shoelace (Sacramento County Sheriff's Department)

communications.communication:
To Whom It May Concern:

Pursuant to the California Public Records Act, I hereby request the following records:

The results of the DNA test of the shoelace recovered from the double homicide of Brian and Katie Maggiore. The evidence was received by Inv. Larry Pool of the Orange County Sheriff's Department on 5/1/03. The test results were dated 6/16/03 and compared to semen recovered from the Harrington case.

The requested documents will be made available to the general public, and this request is not being made for commercial purposes.

In the event that there are fees, I would be grateful if you would inform me of the total charges in advance of fulfilling my request. I would prefer the request filled electronically, by e-mail attachment if available or CD-ROM if not.

Thank you in advance for your anticipated cooperation in this matter. I look forward to receiving your response to this request within 10 calendar days, as the statute requires.

Sincerely,

Robert Neville
